body.name: LUXE Bidet NEO 185 Plus - Only Patented Bidet Attachment for Toilet Seat, Innovative Hinges to Clean, Slide-in Easy Install, Advanced 360° Self-Clean, Dual Nozzles, Feminine & Rear Wash (White)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 41 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 13 hrs 26 mins
features: NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN INNOVATION – The only bidet that flips up and out of the way for easy cleaning of hard-to-reach spots. Activate the 360° Self-Cleaning mode for panoramic cleaning of both the guard gate and nozzles.

FASTEST, EASIEST INSTALLATION – Patented, U-shaped adjustment plates allow for quick and easy installation without removing the entire toilet seat. Stainless steel hinges allow for adjustments even after installation. Compatible with LUXE Toilet Seat.
GENTLE FEMININE WASH – Dual nozzles for rear and frontal wash, perfect for monthly cycles and expecting mothers.
SLEEKER, MODERN LOOK – New low-profile, compact design comes in three premium finishes: White, Rose Gold, and Chrome. Features ergonomic knobs and improved water pressure control.
WARRANTY & SERVICE – All LUXE Bidet NEO Plus bidets include an 18-month manufacturer’s warranty that can be extended to 2 years by registering your product on the LUXE Bidet website.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is the difference between NEO 185 and NEO 185 Plus? Both NEO 185 and NEO 185 Plus come with rear wash, feminine wash, and self-cleaning modes, however the NEO Plus features an upgraded Advanced 360° Self-Cleaning Mode. All NEO Plus models come with a Lift-to-Clean and Slide-in Installation features. Is it hard to install the NEO Plus to my toilet? The patented EZ-Lift Hinges on the NEO Plus make installation quick and simple, without having to remove your toilet seat. Combined with our first-class LUXE Customer Support team, you never have to worry with a LUXE Bidet. What is Advanced 360° Self-Clean Mode, and how is it different from the self-clean modes of other bidets? Only NEO Plus Series bidets come with this innovative cleaning mode. Now upgraded to flush debris off not only the bidet nozzle(s), but also the Guard Gate as well. This feature is designed to help you maintain the bidet in between routine upkeep. Which toilets are compatible with the NEO Plus Series? Is there a weight limit for NEO Plus bidets? The NEO Plus is compatible with most 2-piece toilets and some 1-piece toilets, and works with most toilet seats including the LUXE Toilet Seat. Check the above NEO Plus Fit Chart prior to purchase. The weight limit for NEO Plus bidets is 300 lbs. Can I install the NEO Plus Series bidet with the same parts from my NEO Series bidet? For LUXE Customers upgrading from a NEO to a NEO Plus Series bidet, please use the new parts included with your kit. NEO Plus Series bidets come with Standard 3/8" Fittings, which are different from NEO Series 1/4" fittings.

LUXE Bidet Products NEO 185 NEO 185 Plus LUXE Toilet Seat Features Retractable nozzles, protective guard gate, and built to fit most toilet setups. Features Slide-in Installation, Advanced 360° Self-Clean Mode, and Lift-to-Clean Hinges. Features Soft-close, quick-release, and designed to fit any bidet attachment. Why This LUXE Bidet's original best-selling bidet, with over millions of customers. Why This LUXE Bidet's innovative bidet with never-before-seen patented features. Why This Seamlessly install with any bidet attachment or as a normal feature-packed seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation and excellent quality
reviews.reviewText: I think I waited so long to get one of these because I was nervous about installing it. I shouldn't have. It really is that easy. All I needed was a screwdriver to loosen my existing seat (not even remove it). Everything else was there. Took me 10-15 minutes. It looks great and works great. Easy to clean, as well. Kicking myself that I didn't do it earlier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wish I ordered this year's ago
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful appliance. Everyone should have one. Using this bidet is like taking a shower several times a day. The freshness and cleanliness is fantastic. I would give this 10 stars if I could. It was easy to install and worked fine on the first try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reviving Luxury: The Bidet Unit That Transforms Your Bathroom Experience
reviews.reviewText: In a world where comfort and convenience are paramount, the bidet unit has become a must-have addition to any modern bathroom. And when it comes to delivering an unparalleled experience, our recent encounter with the [Model Name] bidet unit has left us utterly impressed.Replacing our broken bidet unit with the same model was a breeze, thanks to its user-friendly installation process. Within just ten minutes, we were able to revive the luxurious touch we had been missing. From the moment we activated its gentle stream of warm water, we were transported to a realm of ultimate cleanliness and freshness.The [Model Name] bidet unit boasts an array of features that elevate our daily bathroom routine. Its adjustable water pressure and temperature options cater to our individual preferences, ensuring a personalized experience every time. The soothing heated seat and warm air dryer add an extra layer of comfort, making it feel like a spa in the privacy of our own home.With its sleek and modern design, the [Model Name] seamlessly integrates into any bathroom decor, enhancing the overall aesthetic appeal. Its intuitive controls and illuminated display make it a delight to use, even for the technologically challenged.In conclusion, the [Model Name] bidet unit has truly revolutionized our bathroom experience. Its effortless installation, luxurious features, and elegant design make it a standout choice for those seeking to upgrade their daily hygiene routine. Say goodbye to ordinary bathroom experiences and embrace the next level of comfort with the [Model Name] bidet unit. It's a game-changer that will leave you wondering how you ever lived without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2 years and still working on my oval toilets - but doesn't fit small round toilet.
reviews.reviewText: I always come back to this bidet whenever I need a new one installed on my large oval toilets. It's reliable and works and it doesn't look as ugly and plasic like the other ones.Pros: easy to installCons: doesn't seem to work with round smaller toilets (make sure your toilet is the oval long diameter)There are plenty of less expensive bidets but this one has never failed me for my large oval toilets so I will keep coming back to it. I had to return other ones because for the smaller toilets, it's just not a compatible fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Bidet for Women and Men and Makes Cleaning Much Easier!
reviews.reviewText: We installed the LUXE Bidet NEO 185 Plus, replacing our Luxe Bide Neo Elite that we have had since 2018 or 5 years. This new model has hinges allowing you to swing up the bidet piece to clean behind the nozzle area which to be honest, I had not been able to clean very well in those 5 years with the Neo Elite, since I could not get a toilet brush back there and I tried to clean with a paper towel and cleaner. With this 185 Plus, I am able to raise the toilet seat then the bidet and hold up the bidet attachment to clean behind the nozzle area with a toilet brush. We have a longer, older Universal-Rundle 1.6 gpf toilet.The controls looks more rectangular than the Elite and the Plus knobs have more edges than the Elite. Although I miss the softer curved lines on the Elite, I have gotten used to edges that might allow for better grip and turning.Installation time took less than 15 minutes to take out our old Elite and replace it with the Plus, not including the time to empty the toilet tank. Having a small glass with straight edges helped with emptying the water as did a washcloth to soak up the water. We probably did not have to do such a thorough job, just make sure water is below the outtake area. A small towel will also be helpful when you disconnect the water hose. The bidet comes with a good instruction book, parts, and a plastic wrench. You will need a large flathead screwdriver to unscrew your toilet lid.Even having had the 185 Neo Elite, you will need to replace the water supply hose and T-adapter with the ones provided in the kit. The Plus uses a standard 3/8" fitting. Previously for the Elite, we had to buy a special T-adapter to get the original Neo Elite to fit. The company may have provided one if we contacted them, but we had bought it from Amazon. For the Plus, the hose is 7/8" to connect up to the water tank while the end that connect with the bidet is 3/8".We replaced both our Elite bidets in one day and found it easier to:1. Turn off the water and mostly empty the toilet tank2. Take off the toilet seat and old bidet. It will give you more room to access the pipes on the left.3. Replace and connect up the new hose and T-adapter4. Put the new bidet on and then the toilet seat over it. We did not change out the previous hinge covers from the Elite bidet.5. Screw the pieces gently together6. Have a woman sit on the toilet and see if the feminine and bottom wash spray are coming out to spray the right areas. If not adjust the bidet position.The 185 Plus bidet spray come out more as a good, strong spray and less of the Elite's penatrating, directed stream of water which used to result in a loop of having to go to the bathroom again, spraying to clean and having to go again, etc. I am happier with the way the 185 Plus sprays. The 185 Plus includes the self-cleaning feature allowing water to wash over the nozzles. The controls and the way the knobs work are the same for the Elite and the Plus, so there is no learning curve. The knob farthest out controls the water pressure, turn this one slowly. The knob closest to the tank adjusts from feminine wash (to the far left), normal wash (middle), and nozzle self-clean (far right).As I mentioned, we have been using the Luxe Bidet Neo Elite series since 2018 and have been very pleased with them. We had two that we installed in our house, we liked them so much. I had bought a replacement knob in 2022 from the company since the inner plastic part which kept it in place had broken off. They arrived quickly. In 2023, I was sent an e-mail from Luxe Bidet, since I had left a 5 star Amazon review on the Elite in 2018, they offered me a 10% discount toward a new Luxe Bidet Plus and up to $50 refund check for my Elite bidet. I ordered the new Luxe Bidet Plus, provided the Amazon order information, and they sent me a $50 check even though the original Elite did not cost $50.I am really happy to get this new model, so I can clean behind the nozzle area. Also, in the 5 years, the bottom of the old Elite nozzles had gotten rather dirty even with the protective door cover. I know I did not do the self cleaning as often as I should. Periodically, I would also use cleaner and paper towel to clean them off more.I am delighted to have the new LUXE Bidet NEO 185 Plus and know I will get many cleaner years from this newer model. These bidets really help you feel much cleaner with less work and stretching to get all the areas and saves a ton of toilet paper. I was most grateful to have the bidet during the great COVID-19 Toilet Paper Shortage of 2020.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Never thought I'd get use to this device, but it's a life changer. Easy to install and worked perfect from the start. Savings in toilet paper use will pay for this device in a month or two. The wear and tear on the sewer system is obvious. Health and hygiene are increased. The fact it has no warm water connection or control is a non- factor. I thought it would be, but it's not. I've used it when it's below 20 degrees outside, early in the morning and it is very comfortable. I recommend it very, very highly.

reviews.reviewText: Works perfect, and easy to install ( I’ve installed 3 now) very good quality, especially at the price.
Easy to install. Works better than I ever expected. Clean paper every time.
Excelente; cumple muy bien lo descrito al promocionarlo

It is a very nice product but I am unable to use it in Singapore. Until today, I am unable to find a suitable adapter that connects the bidet hose to our local water supply. It's a pity.
